name: City-View-Two-Bedroom-Suites-Master-Bedroom
caption: Master Bedroom
alt:
The City View Two Bedroom Suite offer spectacular views of Manhattan’s Upper East Side. The small foyer opens to an elegantly designed living room that features a comfortable sofa and coffee table opposite the 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar.  There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.
 
The suites comprise of two bedrooms – the master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two night stands with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. A 40” TV and console is located across from the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.

The second bedroom comprises of twin beds, the room features a nightstand between the two beds, Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock and an executive writing desk and chair. A 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar is located across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.
